pages.text: The White Widow Strain$(br2)Base THC: 15% $(br)Base CBD: 10% $(br)Effect: Wind Charged
White Widow Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
White Widow Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
White Widow Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting White Widow Weed in an Extractor
You can package your white widow weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
